title: Oru Pennai Parthu Nilavai Lyrics Dheiva Thaai
stanzas:
Oru Pennai Parthu Nilavai Lyrics Dheiva Thaai
#TMS #Vaali #MGR

oru pennai paathu
nilavai paarthaen
nilavil kulir illai.

aval kannai paarthu
malarai paarthen
malaril oli illai.

aval illaamal naan illai
naan illaamal aval illai
aval illaamal naan illai
naan illaamal aval illai

kodi minnal pol
oru paarvai.
maano meeno endrirundhen.

oru pennai paathu
nilavai paarthaen
nilavil kulir illai.

aval kannai paarthu
malarai paarthen
malaril oli illai.

aval illaamal naan illai
naan illaamal aval illai
aval illaamal naan illai
naan illaamal aval illai

kalai annam pol
oru thottram
idaiyil idaiyo kidayaadhu.

oru pennai paathu
nilavai paarthaen
nilavil kulir illai.

aval kannai paarthu
malarai paarthen
malaril oli illai.

aval illaamal naan illai
naan illaamal aval illai
aval illaamal naan illai
naan illaamal aval illai
